describe.zh_CN: 将祝福与灾害融合起来、并将元素回旋的力量融于的宝石，看上去平平无奇，却有着不可思议力量...\n先人曾暗示过元素有着提升能量的可能，隐隐约约感觉和这个宝石有着千丝万缕的联系。\n学者称这种力量为逆变。
describe.en_US: Blending blessings and calamities, and infusing the power of swirling elements into a gem, it may seem ordinary, but it possesses incredible force...\nAncestors once hinted at the possibility of enhancing power with elements, and there seems to be a subtle connection to this gem.\nScholars refer the force as 'Invert'.
